title: Kambala, bull races now legal in Karnataka | India News
text:
BENGALURU: The Karnataka state legislature on Monday legalised kambala , bull runs and bullock cart races, terming them traditional sports and exempted them from the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act , by amending it with a legislation. 

The bill was carefully worded, and said there should be no harm to the animals. 

Moving the bill, animal husbandry minister A Manju sought the assistance of the BJP members to secure quick assent from the home ministry at the Centre, and subsequent assent from the President of India. 

Opposition leader Jagadish Shettar said the government decision was a welcome move and the judiciary must deliberate and discuss such cases at length, before arriving at any decisions on such sensitive matters.
